descriptionHtml:
If like me you'd rather a bit... well a lot less "I honor my lord by destroying you"'s, replacing the dialogue with resounding silence, then this mod is exactly what you need.

Turn that deafening rabble of screechy almost incoherent nonsense into soothing quiet (minus clashing swords) with "Silence of the Dremora".

A quick little mod that took me about 10mins to make, all this does is simply turn off the verbal and written dialogue attached to regular Dremora Lords by adding in a condition that in order to speak a Dremora Lord has to have a dremora voice AND be female. (Dremora are all male.)
author: AbeTheBlackFox
